title: "[Issue] - "

---

## Description
Provide a clear and concise description of the issue.

## Context
Why is this relevant? What problem or situation does it relate to?

## Proposed solution (if any)
(Optional) Do you have an idea of how it could be addressed?

## Checklist
- [ ] This issue does not duplicate an existing one
- [ ] Enough detail is provided for the team to understand and act on it
